--- select_singer_with_tableset_complex.sql
SELECT * FROM Singers
UNION ALL
(
  SELECT * FROM Singers
  UNION DISTINCT
  (
    SELECT * FROM Singers
    INTERSECT ALL
    (
      SELECT * FROM Singers
      INTERSECT DISTINCT
      (
        SELECT * FROM Singers
        EXCEPT ALL
        (
          SELECT * FROM Singers
          EXCEPT DISTINCT
          SELECT * FROM Singers
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*ast.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &ast.CompoundQuery{
    Op:            "UNION",
    AllOrDistinct: "ALL",
    Queries:       []ast.QueryExpr{
      &ast.Select{
        Select:        0,
        AllOrDistinct: "",
        As:            nil,
        Results:       []ast.SelectItem{
          &ast.Star{
            Star: 7,
          },
        },
        From: &ast.From{
          From:   9,
          Source: &ast.TableName{
            Table: &ast.Ident{
              NamePos: 14,
              NameEnd: 21,
              Name:    "Singers",
            },
            Hint:   (*ast.Hint)(nil),
            As:     (*ast.AsAlias)(nil),
            Sample: (*ast.TableSample)(nil),
          },
        },
        Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
        GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
        Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
      },
      &ast.SubQuery{
        Lparen: 32,
        Rparen: 367,

          Op:            "UNION",
          AllOrDistinct: "DISTINCT",

            &ast.Select{
              Select:        36,
              AllOrDistinct: "",

                                            Name:    "Singers",

}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM Singers UNION ALL (SELECT * FROM Singers UNION DISTINCT (SELECT * FROM Singers INTERSECT ALL (SELECT * FROM Singers INTERSECT DISTINCT (SELECT * FROM Singers EXCEPT ALL (SELECT * FROM Singers EXCEPT DISTINCT SELECT * FROM Singers)))))
